summary: Whilst on a family vacation on the Mahurangi Peninsula in New Zealand, 13-year-old Janey begins to realize that her parents' marriage is on the rocks.
cast: Alicia Fulford-Wierzbicki|Sarah Peirse|Marton Csokas|Alistair Browning|Aaron Murphy|David Taylor|Chris Sherwood|Claire Dougan|Alison Routledge|Pino Scopas|Ross Harper|Jane Irwin|Tom Evans|Andi Reveley|Lu Rathe
title: Rain
